name: Flying Real Dragon Simulator
description: Flying Dragon Simulator is a 3d dragon flying and fighting game. Join the unlimited fun of 3d flying dragons in the vast environment and landscapes. Unlock many dragons in the shop and enjoy the fun of every last dragon. The enemy has dragons too. They are blood thirsty of your dragon. Use your dragon flying skills to defeat them and find the missing eggs. Feed your dragon to keep him alive in the dragon arena. You can unlock many levels in this game by collecting all the eggs in the level and surviving the attacks of the mighty enemy dragons. Gain experience and coins by completing each level and use these coins to purchase other dragons. Hope you enjoy the game & rate it. Thanks
